description.title: Khateeb Remind
description.shortText: A progressive web-app that automates the process of scheduling Friday Sermons at Muslim Community Centers and Mosques
description.longText: Originally created for the University of Calgary Muslim Students Association, Khateeb Remind is now open-sourced and free for anyone to use. Khateeb remind aims to give a 'native-like' experience by using some of the more cutting-edge features of progressive web-apps like downloadablity, push notifications, offline mode, etc. The app is also blazing fast for it's size, with a bundle size of < 200kb. Check out the System Specification Document for more info.

description.title: IlmConnect
description.shortText: A commercial school management SASS-product which has served over 4,000 users
description.longText: This is a startup product I helped build a while ago and has recently been discontinued. It was a full school management system for Islamic Schools that included parents, admins, students, classes. At it's height it had about 4,000 users active users (about 10 schools or so). This product was worked on by a small team, and I personally worked on both sides of the stack for this particular project. Some legacy instances of the app still exist like the one in the link above.

description.title: Burdy
description.shortText: A web-app that finds customer pain-points in Amazon product reviews and draws themes from them
description.longText: In another life I used to do copywriting work, and one thing that copywriters do a lot is look at reviews, because usually you'll find words that resonate with your audience in them. This app attempted to automate this process of looking through reviews, so copywriters could delve right into analysis of information and create great copy faster. It achieved this by scraping reviews off a particular Amazon product and then performing sentimental analysis on the reviews, which would group them into common themes. If your interested in the full architecuture of the app take a look at the System Specification Document.

description.title: Pomodoro Timer
description.shortText: A dead-simple pomodoro timer that I use on the daily
description.longText: I created this timer for one simple reason: I wanted a timer that was ONLY a timer and not bloated with a million other features and ads, especially not ads.
